item.title: About Hello FOSS
item.description: HelloFOSS was started last year, on the lines of HacktoberFest and GSoC. It provides many with their first opportunity to develop Software as a community.

item.title: GitHub Tutorial
item.description: GitHub is a code hosting platform for version control and collaboration. It lets you and others work together on projects from anywhere.

item.title: How To Setup Meghna Hugo
item.description: Install this template by following those simple steps: STEP-1 : Hugo installation Check this link below for install hugo on your computer.
